item.title: [Pi]Quest Tab Help
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

My questab is not showing up right and I need help.Here is what it currently looks like at the moment.

[code]public void clearQInterface() {
for(int iD = 29172; iD <= 29264;iD++){
getPA().sendFrame126("", iD);
}
getPA().sendFrame126("", 663);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Mysterious Pk Player: “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+””, 29155); //Tab Title

	getPA().sendFrame126("Player Status", 29161); //1st section title
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Playername: @gre@"+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" " , 29162);
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Combat Level: @gre@" +combatLevel+ " ", 29163);
		if (playerRights == 0)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rank: @cya@Mysterious Pk @whi@Player.", 29164);
		if (playerRights == 1)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rank: @cya@Mysterious Pk @blu@Mod.", 29164);
		if (playerRights == 2)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rank: @cya@Mysterious Pk @yel@Admin.", 29164);
		if (playerRights == 3)
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rank: @cya@Mysterious Pk @red@Owner.", 29164);
			
		if (isDonator == 0)
			getPA().sendFrame126("Donator: @red@Not Activated", 29165); //2nd section title
		if (isDonator == 0)
			getPA().sendFrame126("Donator: @gre@Activated", 29165); //2nd section title
			
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Exp Lock Status: @gre@"+xpLock+" ", 29166);
			getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Slayer Task: @gre@"+Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(slayerTask)+" ", 29167);
			getPA().sendFrame126("@Player Killing Points: @gre@"+pkPoints+"  ", 29168);
			getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Save Game ", 29169);
		
	getPA().sendFrame126("Website & Forum", 29170); //2nd section title
		getPA().sendFrame126("", 29173);
		getPA().sendFrame126(" ", 29176);[/code]

Read full topic
